articles.description: According to reports , Tottenham are ready to use Chelsea's failure in the summer as an opportunity to pounce - with the Blues reportedly no longer interested.
articles.content:
Tottenham Hotspur are said to be 'considering a £60m move for Anthony Gordon' in January in an attempt to bolster their attack.
Gordon was linked with a summer move to Chelsea earlier in the year - … [+1773 chars]

articles.title: FIFA created this sick joke of a Qatar World Cup... begging us to look away now is laughable - Daily Mail
articles.description: OLIVER HOLT: I would like to commend FIFA on their latest attempt to silence dissent surrounding the staging of a tournament awarded in that magnificent carnival of venality.
articles.content:
Dear President and Secretary-General,

articles.title: Princess of Wales stuns in Alexander McQueen coat as she braves the rain at Rugby League World Cup - Daily Mail
articles.description: The mother-of-three, 40, said she was 'proud to be their patron' after both the men and women's teams  triumphed over Papua New Guinea and Canada DW Stadium in Wigan this afternoon.
articles.content:
The Princess of Wales cheered England to victory as she dodged the rain at the Rugby League World Cup Quarter Final after taking over the royal as patron from Prince Harry.
